entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
